item.description:
FRIDAY MARCH 27 - The Happening -Party Like its 1969

DOORS OPEN at 8 pm
* includes hors d'oeuvres buffet *
Join the CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club for an unforgettable night of entertainment at the beautiful:

Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility
1250 Burnside Ave
East Hartford, CT 06108
I-84 to Exit 60 (near the Manchester line - next to Wickham Park)
(860) 236-3343

"The Happening” brings back to life the fabulous music and atmosphere of the entire 1960's decade. They are a six-piece band dedicated to bringing back the sights, the sounds and the music of the greatest era of Rock n Roll music of all time.


Armed with only the most appropriate of vintage and retro instruments, we do our best to faithfully recreate the sights, the sounds and feel for the spirit of the music and times, yet we play it with an edge and energy that catapults it into the new Millennium. The Happening Experience is a visual and musical journey that you don’t want to miss!

This show will sell out- so get your tickets now!

Tickets are only $15
ONLINE TICKET SPECIAL – 2 Tickets for only $20 until March 25 2009
only at http://www.MarcoPoloE...

CLICK HERE FOR ONLINE TICKET SPECIAL
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Tables
